alert.note: Alert for Broome (New York) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Binghamton (South Central New York and Northeastern Pennsylvania)
info.headline: Flood Warning issued May 01 at 4:18AM EDT until May 02 at 9:42AM EDT by NWS Binghamton
info.description: ...The Flood Warning is extended for the following rivers in New York... Chenango River At Chenango Forks affecting Broome County. ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT FROM EARLY THIS MORNING TO LATE TOMORROW MORNING... * WHAT...Minor flooding is occurring and minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Chenango River At Chenango Forks. * WHEN...From early this morning to late tomorrow morning. * IMPACTS...At 11.0 feet, The soccer fields and low lying trails at Otsiningo Park North flood. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 3:46 AM EDT Monday the stage was 10.3 feet. - Recent Activity...The maximum river stage in the 24 hours ending at 3:46 AM EDT Monday was 10.3 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise to a crest of 11.0 feet this morning. It will then fall below flood stage late this evening. - Flood stage is 10.0 feet. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood &&
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov.
